org.gearvrf.script

Class GVRScriptManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gearvrf.script.GVRScriptManager

  • public class GVRScriptManager
extends java.lang.Object
    The script manager class handles script engines, script attachment/ detachment with scriptable objects, and other operation related to scripting.

    • Method Detail

      • addGlobalBindings

        protected void addGlobalBindings(javax.script.ScriptEngine engine)

      • getEngine

        public javax.script.ScriptEngine getEngine(java.lang.String language)
        Returns an engine based on language.
        Parameters:
        language - The name of the language. Please use constants defined in ScriptManager, such as LANG_LUA and LANG_JAVASCRIPT.
        Returns:
        The engine object. null if the specified engine is not found.

      • addVariable

        public void addVariable(java.lang.String varName,
                        java.lang.Object value)
        Add a variable to the scripting context.
        Parameters:
        varName - The variable name.
        value - The variable value.

      • attachScriptFile

        public void attachScriptFile(IScriptable target,
                             GVRScriptFile scriptFile)
        Attach a script file to a scriptable target.
        Parameters:
        target - The scriptable target.
        scriptFile - The script file object.

      • detachScriptFile

        public void detachScriptFile(IScriptable target)
        Detach any script file from a scriptable target.
        Parameters:
        target - The scriptable target.

      • getScriptFile

        public GVRScriptFile getScriptFile(IScriptable target)
        Gets a script file from a scriptable target.
        Parameters:
        target - The scriptable target.
        Returns:
        The script file or null.

      • loadScript

        public GVRScriptFile loadScript(GVRAndroidResource resource,
                                java.lang.String language)
                         throws java.io.IOException,
                                GVRScriptException
        Loads a script file using GVRAndroidResource.
        Parameters:
        resource - The resource object.
        language - The language string.
        Returns:
        A script file object or null if not found.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if script file cannot be read.
        GVRScriptException - if script processing error occurs.

      • loadScriptBundle

        public GVRScriptBundle loadScriptBundle(java.lang.String filePath,
                                        GVRResourceVolume volume)
                                 throws java.io.IOException
        Load a script bundle file. It defines bindings between scripts and GVRf objects (e.g., scene objects and the GVRMain object).
        Parameters:
        filePath - The path and filename of the script bundle.
        volume - The GVRResourceVolume from which to load the bundle file and scripts.
        Returns:
        The loaded script bundle.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if script bundle file cannot be read.

      • bindScriptBundle

        public void bindScriptBundle(GVRScriptBundle scriptBundle,
                             GVRMain gvrMain,
                             boolean bindToMainScene)
                      throws java.io.IOException,
                             GVRScriptException
        Binds a script bundle to a GVRScene object.
        Parameters:
        scriptBundle - The script bundle.
        gvrMain - The GVRMain to bind to.
        bindToMainScene - If true, also bind it to the main scene on the event GVRMain.onAfterInit().
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if script bundle file cannot be read.
        GVRScriptException - if script processing error occurs.

      • bindScriptBundleToScene

        public void bindScriptBundleToScene(GVRScriptBundle scriptBundle,
                                    GVRScene scene)
                             throws java.io.IOException,
                                    GVRScriptException
        Binds a script bundle to a scene.
        Parameters:
        scriptBundle - The GVRScriptBundle object containing script binding information.
        scene - The scene to bind to.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if script bundle file cannot be read.
        GVRScriptException - if script processing error occurs.

      • bindBundleToSceneObject

        public void bindBundleToSceneObject(GVRScriptBundle scriptBundle,
                                    GVRSceneObject rootSceneObject)
                             throws java.io.IOException,
                                    GVRScriptException
        Binds a script bundle to scene graph rooted at a scene object.
        Parameters:
        scriptBundle - The GVRScriptBundle object containing script binding information.
        rootSceneObject - The root of the scene object tree to which the scripts are bound.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if script bundle file cannot be read.
        GVRScriptException - if a script processing error occurs.
